person.name: Lowell M. Snow
person.description: Elder Lowell M. Snow was called to serve as a member of the Second Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 2, 2005, at age 61. He was called as an Area Authority Seventy in the Utah North Area and a member of the Fifth Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 3, 2004. He served in the Africa West Area Presidency (2005-2009) and as President for three years. He is currently serving as assistant executive director in the Missionary Department.
